RumorFact.Text: A Nomai named Cassava visited the Sun Station to learn how it causes significant impact to a star.

ExploreFact.Text: The Sun Station induces a supernova by opening a white hole at the core of the sun.
"While nothing can escape a black hole's event horizon, nothing can enter a white hole's event horizon."
The Sun Station failed because its white hole was not strong enough to overpower the sun's gravity.
